member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE
member.summary: The CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE structure specifies an attribute that has one or more values.

member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE.pszObjId
member.summary: An object identifier (OID) that specifies the type of data contained in the rgValue array.

member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE.cValue
member.summary: A DWORD value that indicates the number of elements in the rgValue array.

member.name: CRYPT_ATTRIBUTE.rgValue
member.summary: Pointer to an array of CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structures. The cbData member of the CRYPT_INTEGER_BLOB structure indicates the length of the pbData member. The pbData member contains the attribute information.
